description:
Overview
Throughout the course, I use realistic business scenarios to show practical application for each technique. Furthermore, the learning style includes on screen visual tips and directions to better accommodate visual learners. The audio style is casual and laidback to provide a little extra entertainment and humor. I hope you enjoy my course!

Course Contents

  • Business Scenarios
  • Practical Application
  • Starter and Completed files
  • On Screen Visual tips
  • Entertaining audio style
Key Learning Areas
  • Pivot Tables
  • Basic to advanced Functions
  • Formatting and Charts
  • Business Level Data Analysis
  • Data cleaning techniques

I look forward to teaching you

Sincerely,
Neil Parsont
title: Excel - beginner to HIRED!
